title: MAP - Promotional CDROM
creator_credit: Astrid Scott, Kim Montgomery and ACMI
brief_description:
The MAP project is a public interactive created by ACMI to collect and exhibit works that explore the visual memories associated with places. MAP sources, produces and screens archival, community and artist generated visual impressions of locations across Victoria - recording the history of places as experienced by theri inhabitants.

This interactive CDROM was created to provide information to City and Regional councils , schools, community groups and individuals about:
ACMI and Memory Grid; the MAP Project and how to get involved, how to submit and submission guidelines; Contains MAP sample works
